artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Yamamotoya Heikichi
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: vertical ōban triptych;bind in a book with 96.146.106*
inscription: Characters, names written aside each figure, right panel: {Inuzuka Shino} | center panel: {Inukai Genpachi} & [Sainaya Bungobe_?] | left panel: {Inuta Kobungo & Yamabayashi Fusahachi}
medium: Woodblock prints (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche on each sheet: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play "Satomi hakkenden" 里見八犬伝 (Satomi and the Legend of the Eight Dog Warriors), performed at the Ichimura Theater, 1852, 1st month.
title: Actors Bandō Shūka I as Inuzuka Shino (R), Seki Sanjūrō III as Inukai Genpachi, Ōtani Tomoemon IV as Konaya Bungobei (C), Arashi Kichisaburō III as Inuta Kobungo, and Sawamura Chōjūrō V as Yamabayashi Fusahachi (L)
